description:
This error occurs under the following situations.

- cinder is using the NFS driver.
- cinder volume is attached to the instance.
- fail to live migrate before destination host attach to the NFS server

We should consider whether destination host has mounted to NFS server or not when executing rollback of live-migration.

<Error Message>

ProcessExecutionError: Unexpected error while running command.
Command: sudo nova-rootwrap /etc/nova/rootwrap.conf umount /var/lib/nova/mnt/b5e2fcf5ad9470489747f7caa242747b
Exit code: 32
Stdout: u''
Stderr: u'umount: /var/lib/nova/mnt/b5e2fcf5ad9470489747f7caa242747b: not mounted\n'
title: Rollback of live-migration fails in the case of cinder with the NFS driver

comments.content:
This error occurs under the following situations. 

- cinder is using the NFS driver.
- cinder volume is attached to the instance.
- fail to live migrate before destination host attach to the NFS server

We should consider whether destination host has mounted to NFS server or not when executing rollback of live-migration .

<Error Message>

ProcessExecutionError: Unexpected error while running command.
Command: sudo nova-rootwrap /etc/nova/rootwrap.conf umount /var/lib/nova/mnt/b5e2fcf5ad9470489747f7caa242747b
Exit code: 32
Stdout: u''
Stderr: u'umount: /var/lib/nova/mnt/b5e2fcf5ad9470489747f7caa242747b: not mounted\n'
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~h-eguchi

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/228351
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: Could you provide more concrete steps to reproduce?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~tdurakov

comments.content:
<Steps to reproduce>

1. boot the instance.

2. create a volume.

3. attach a volume to the instance.

4. execute live-migration of above instance.

5. fail to live migrate before the destination host connect to the NFS server which backend for cinder service.
  (e.g. due to timeout)

6. fail to rollback of live-migration due to an above ProcessExecutionError.
  - the destination host tries to unmount to the NFS server, 
    however, it fails because that host does not mount to the NFS server.

7. show the status of instance
  - it shows in an ERROR status.
  - if rollback of live-migration works correctly, it should return to "ACTIVE" status.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~h-eguchi

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/228351
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=f00f3bee239836b095e2c99c363586f17dae9b72
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit f00f3bee239836b095e2c99c363586f17dae9b72
Author: Hiroyuki Eguchi <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Sep 28 17:24:01 2015 +0900

    Rollback of live-migration fails with the NFS driver
    
    This error occurs when fail to live migrate before
    destination host attach to the NFS server.
    We should consider whether destination host has mounted to
    NFS server or not when executing rollback of live-migration.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1500337
    Change-Id: Id6d0bfead0557e1dfe4aeee56a7d85adaf38549a
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 13.0.0.0b2 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
